title: John Glenn - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/16/21
itunes:title: John Glenn - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/16/21
description:
George Noory and author Jeff Shesol explore his research into astronaut John Glenn, who undertook America's first manned space flight, the dangers of the mission, how President Kennedy promoted America's mission to beat Russia to the Moon, as well as Glenn's later career as a United States Senator.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
